text: The Albanian Armed Forces were formed after the declaration of independence in 1912. There is the General Staff, the Albanian Army, the Albanian Air Force and the Albanian Naval Defense Forces. The Albanian Army is helped by the United States, Germany, the Netherlands, Italy, the United Kingdom, Greece, Turkey, Switzerland, Denmark and Belgium. ==History== Although there were earlier Albanian armies the modern forces were founded in 1912. In 1928 it had 8.000 soldiers. The army grew up to 511.000 soldiers during the communist era due to forced conscription. There are 14,500 troops and 2,000 civilians, trained to NATO standards. ==References== Category:Military by country Category:Politics of Albania Category:20th-century establishments in Albania
title: Albanian Armed Forces
